author: mmusich
body:
resolves #36302

#### PR description:

As suggested in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36302#issuecomment-982766274

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A

#### Note to reviewers:

1. I chose `Geometry/CommonTopologies` among the ones indicated in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36302#issue-1067387026, but could be any other. Please confirm it's OK.
2. in the same folder  `Geometry/CommonTopologies` there is also a `PixelTopology.h` file. 

https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/131e8b49c64859fb72fbff388b62f9a7348ea6e1/Geometry/CommonTopologies/interface/PixelTopology.h#L1

To avoid confusions, this one could be named `siPixelTopology.h` or `simplePixelTopology.h` or something like that. Suggestions are welcome.
title: move `pixelTopology.h` from `Geometry/TrackerGeometryBuilder` to `Geometry/CommonTopologies`
